title: Justin Trudeau - Wikipedia
snippet: Justin Pierre James Trudeau (born December 25, 1971) is a Canadian politician who served as the 23rd prime minister of Canada from 2015 to 2025.

title: Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau resigns
snippet: Under growing pressure from his own party, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has announced he will step down and end his nine-year stretch as leader.

title: 2025 Year-End Headlines – Provincial/National | River Country 94.9
snippet: December 22, 2025 · January · Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced his resignation, as well as the prorogue of Government until March. Trudeau also stepped down as Federal Liberal Party leader, when a new successor was named.

title: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife announce their separation : NPR
snippet: TORONTO — Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife, Sophie Gregoire Trudeau, announced Wednesday that they are separating after 18 years of marriage.

title: Trudeau stepping down as Canada’s PM after rapid decline in public approval | PBS News
snippet: Jan 6, 2025 6:45 PM EST · By — ... · Transcript Audio · Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced he intends to resign as prime minister and the leader of the Liberal Party after a rapid decline in his approval ...
